Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

MILES_QUICK_DIGITAL_OPEN

The basic type MILES_QUICK_DIGITAL_OPEN describes how to open the digital audio system.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 0 Don't open digital audio at all.
 1 Open digital audio. On Win32, try DirectSound first, then try the waveOut drivers if DirectSound fails to load or is running in emulation mode.
 AIL_QUICK_USE_WAVEOUT Open digital audio, but force the use of the waveOut drivers on Win32.


Group: Quick Integration Services
Related Functions: AIL_quick_startup
